name: Meticulous: Meet All Your Needs
description: This ADV is not to fight with monsters but to explore around the town. Functions such as minimaps and fast-travel are implemented for stress-free gameplay. Please enjoy event scenes which come with both HCG and pixel animations!

name: Mega
description: This is a short story about humanity's last attempt to resist nature. Cities lie in ruins, there are traces of huge claws everywhere - once disturbed by people, giants began to wreak havoc around the world. But is there a solution?

name: Medieval Warrior Simulator
description: Medieval Warrior Simulator is about brave medieval warrior walk in the cold night to beat the evil monsters

name: Maxwell's Wicked Dollhouse
description: The year is 1997. Skylar Maxwell was known for his research in biotech, realizing that the human mind is capable of connecting with in-organic sources, and using this knowledge to further the field of prosthetics. After a military buyout, he went silent, and this research became a distant rumor.

name: Mars: The New Eden
description: End of the 21st century. New technologies allowed the realization of a great dream of humanity: the colonization of the red planet. However, something went wrong, which could compromise the viability of this project. Embark on this adventure guiding our hero Rick and unravel the mysteries of Mars.

name: New Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja
description: We're back in the distant Past, when “Rock & Roll” was just about rocks and “Fast food”, a dinner that you couldn’t catch. 2 cave dudes named Joe & Mac live in a peaceful and cool village. Cool it was, until a bogus bunch of Neanderthal snatched all the village’s women!

name: Ninja Hagakure
description: Ninja Hagakure is a ninja survival game. Defeat the ever-increasing number of enemies with a variety of ninja techniques to suit the situation.

name: Noracam's Slider Challenge
description: Retro 3D slider action game. Beat the 6 slides full of speed brilliantly. There is also an online ranking

name: Notebook Entries Vol.1
description: Horror Anthology focusing on different tension methods. One should caress your fears..

name: Nova Squadron
description: Dive straight into Jupiter's atmosphere and take down vast flying fortresses from within in fast-paced, arcade flight combat. Losing your plane is just a setback - return with an upgraded replacement and take back lost territory in Nova Squadron's roguelite campaign.

name: No: Worse
description: There are a few cups of tea, bottomless despair, a couple of heartbreaks, and plenty of lies waiting for you in this Visual Novel. And on top of that, you'll find a touching love story between two kind but insanely vulnerable souls.

name: Nutty Motorcars
description: Nutty Motorcars is a classic video game with a new point of view. Up to eight players on a single screen can battle it out in these crazy races. Jumps, bridges, tunnels and many more obstacles. Discover the 30 circuits available in the full version and race on them with 20 different vehicles.

name: Oil Manager
description: Who hasn't dreamed of building an oil empire? Make the dream come true.

name: Neotag League
description: Team up and beat your opponents in Neotag League, the sport from the future, where sci-fi parkour robots chase each other to score points! Jump, roll, wall run, grapple, dodge and attack in this team-based multiplayer game of Chase Tag.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 5
description: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 5 - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 5 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 4
description: Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 4 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 3
description: Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 3 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 2
description: Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 2 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Nature Escapes
description: Get ready to get lost in the wild beauty of Nature with this hidden object game! Let Nature Escapes take you on a trip to handcrafted snapshots of untamed wonder, and decorate your very own garden until it becomes a bouquet of beautiful plants and flowers!

name: Mythic: Frost Trials
description: Mythic Frost Trials is a free, cross-platform, massively multiplayer party game where you and your fellow wanderers compete in the Frost Trials for a coveted spot on the global leaderboard. Will you secure the fate of the realm? Will you become Mythic?

name: My Sugar Mommy is a Futanari
description: In desperate need for extra cash, you take to the internet and come across a Sugar Mommy website.

name: Mystical Riddles: Behind Doll's Eyes - Collector's Edition
description: What's hidden in an ordinary toy? Is it possible to bring the dead back to life? Find answers to these questions using your wits, knowledge of the paranormal phenomena, and your special equipment – a magic camera! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Mystical Conquests
description: A turn-based fantasy strategy game that fuses 4X, RPG and survival. Lead your faction in a world where the forces of evil are trying to destroy every civilizations. Expand your realm, improves your cities, recruit heroes, seek allies, build an army and try to save the world!

name: Lost in the Sand
description: A slow-paced shooter with strategy elements set in a fully destructible environment. Fight with unique weapons in procedurally generated worlds, build and demolish oil extraction camps, manage and upgrade your army in order to conquer the world. The fight for oil has begun!

name: Light Eater
description: Light shows things that cannot be seen. It creates a comfort of the unknown. But not everything is shown in the light. Don’t be afraid of the dark. Be afraid of what’s in the dark. In this game you use the visible light spectrum to avoid unseen dangers and determine possible futures.

name: Lewd Guest
description: Our hero who just lost his job and is forced to move out. But gladly his ex-colleague Steve invites him to live in his apartment until our hero finds a new job. But as it turns out Steve doesn't live alone...

name: Let Me Out
description: Let Me Out is a psychological horror with a depressing mood. The life of the main character lies in your hands. Help him get out of his difficult condition or try the opposite.

name: Legend of Snake
description: Legend of Snake is an improved version of the previous 2 Legend of games, the game has 3 modes including the classic permanent death mode.

name: Lapsus
description: Unravel the mysteries that these forgotten lands hold in this hand-drawn, narrative-driven, 2d action adventure, as a white-robed girl awakens in the depths of an abandoned city.

name: Kings and Catapults
description:
A 2 player turn-based strategy game with hack n slash element in a fantasy setting.
Players secretly set up their pieces and terrain tiles on their half of the 8x8 battleboard and once both players are ready play commences. Pieces move and attack in a fashion similar to Chess, white moves first then black while other pieces impede your movement. Pieces capture other pieces by moving to occupy the enemy square and removing the enemy piece. Capturing is always the end of your turn. Whoever captures the opposing King first wins however there is no check as in Chess.

name: Wild West
description: Wild West is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told a story about the wild west and two lesbians who love to be intimate. One day they met and it started... The game is filled with adult scenes, humor and romance.

name: WFO World Football Online
description: WFO World Football Online is an online football management game with a non-scripted match engine on a virtual football world continuously developed by AI.

name: When We Lost
description: "When We Lost" is a classic horror game in first person perspective. Some day children were missing in mysterious circumstances. There were many rumors and stories about how many people could have been lost, but no one believed in what had really happened so our hero He decided to go take pictures to prove that it was an attempt to hide government experiments.

name: Where's the Bathroom!?!
description: This is a comedic/run and gun game where your overall objective is to find the bathroom, you will battle many different types of enemies on various unique levels! Grab and gun and go have some fun!

name: Without kidney
description: Without kidney is a shooter metroidvania game with a hero who can hook like spiderman and jump with cannon explosions. Using a grappling hook, a cannon and other bonuses, that can be found on the way, you go forward to the main capitalist boss

name: Witch Story
description: In a kingdom, there is a witch who lives off the beaten track. She is busy with alchemy, potion-making, fortune-telling ,frightening people and other magic..They say she has already lived for a few centuries here. The local lord is fed up with such neighbourhood...

name: Witch's Mystery
description: This is a card game that can wake up your memory

name: Witch Schools: Love Potions
description: Move, memorize and make 3 in a row.

name: Wren's Journey
description: As the new entrusted soul chosen to be the next Guardian Bear Spirit of the Island of Virtue. You are tasked with connecting yourself within the land and defending it from all else who seeks to cause it harm.

name: WWII Tanks: Forgotten Battles
description: Choose your side USA/Great Britain, Axis or USSR!Participate in the biggest historical tank battles of World War II!Go through the entire war on different tanks, feel the horror of war on your skin!

name: Xearz
description: Xearz is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with a retro feel. It features a multi-plane that can be moved to the front and back. The player uses a melee weapon, the blade, a gun that can use guided and reflective rounds, and subweapons such as grenades to defeat enemies. Weapons can be upgraded.

name: Ancient Witch Arena
description: "Ancient Witch Arena" is an independently developed light survival Roguelite, hand-painted fantasy dark world. Resist hundreds of enemies, conquer bosses, explore combinations between characters and skills, and finally become the king of the arena.

name: Spirit Charm
description: A few days ago, a woman named Li Wen committed suicide by throwing herself into a well. When everyone wanted to enter the house, there was a sudden lightning flash. A figure was seen standing outside the outfit. Is it the ghost of Li Wen? Or is there someone else?

name: Zoogarnian
description: Game 2D Platformer Zoogarnian tells how the journey of heroes who want to save animals trapped and caged by monsters. This describes a movement to stop committing violence or cruelty to animals that are around but packaged in an interesting way in the form of a Zoogarnian game.

name: Nintendo Classic Mini Double Pack
description: A bundle which contains both mini consoles released by Nintendo in Japan.

name: Zen Golf
description: Zen Golf is a relaxing and chill mini golf experience. Get lost in the beautiful zen gardens and all original lo-fi Japanese soundtrack with up to 20 friends on over 180 levels! Or play against state of the art AI opponents for rewarding and fun solo play.

name: Watamari: A Match Made in Heaven Part1
description: Hoshino HIkari is a female spy who joins an all girls school as a student to discover its secrets with no intention to stand out… when she suddenly receives the Mark of Virgo, and timeslips 1 year in the past?! By the developers of Ne no Kami: The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto.

name: WarpVector
description: WarpVector is an immersive sci-fi roguelike built around space exploration, combat, and navigation. Explore the remnants of an ancient civilization, fend off marauding space pirates, and find a way to save your home planet.

name: War of Wizards
description: Draw & cast your spells, magic showdown! War of Wizards is a VR game with MOBA confrontation. Draw dragons to summon dragons to fight for you, draw fireballs to summon fireballs to shoot at enemies, draw pills to heal yourself... - Draw & cast your spells! - Dodge the skills that the enemy fires!

name: Warna
description: Try to survive if you can! Soul's like a third-person action game. There are four skills and six types of weapons available, plus bonus weapons that fall from mobs and have a limited number of hits. Three types of potions. All acquired skills, weapons and potions are saved.

name: Wardogz
description: Travel the war-torn world of Hellstain as last of the Wardogz, an ancient order of peacekeepers. Fight a huge variety of enemies, ranging from mutants to the walking mechs anc challenge yourself with puzzles and obstacles that will test you physically and mentally.

name: Sapphire Moon: Forever Memories
description: The story will be accompanied by three heroines, and everyone will find their own love in this real and imaginary world. Is it the dark-skinned school girl who is available, the cold and mysterious girl, or the afterimage that I have been unable to reach in my memory?

name: Wandering Duelist
description: The Wandering Duelist is a single-player, narrative-driven adventure game that tells a story of love, conflict and reckless actions. The story takes place on a small and lively planet, where its residents carry on their daily activities that often pose dangers and obstacles for the player.

name: Void Eagle
description: Void Eagle is a single player space racer that requires you to dodge obstacles at breakneck speeds while you try to make it out alive. Will you make it and post the fastest time, or go down in a fiery explosion.

name: Vilomah
description: Play as Jake, a teen Pizza Delivery driver on the late shift - until things get BLOODY! Try to escape this DEMENTED Farm with your life! Features PS1, 80's VHS Graphics.

name: Vera: The Last Hope
description: Hack and slash through a frenetic roguelite and cut your way to the Demon King. Upgrade your favorite abilities and equip new ones as you progress, making countless variations each run.

name: Venus in Furs: Sensual Pleasure
description: Hardpunch's Venus is alone in her temple of love, pleasure, and sex. She knows that the world we know no longer exists. Now, she remains a recluse in her palace and anyone who dares to steal her precious gifts will be punished with explicit and savage sex. This invader will become her sex slave...

name: Valkyrie Champions
description: Team up with up to 4 online players and defeat hoards of monsters in this action based looter-shooter! Unlock powerful tiers of weapons and equipment to develop your character into an unstoppable champion!

name: Upload Simulator
description: A incremental game about downloading files, uploading, and upgrading your setup. This is the official PC version of Upload Simulator.

name: United Heist
description: Your group consists of the best two thieves money can buy. One day a client requested to take something unknown from the government. Now you can decide who stays back managing the intel and who is going into the facility to accomplish the task in this asynchronous coop puzzle game.

name: Umbra Sepulcri
description: As a necromancer you need to gather the souls of the dead, witness their last moments of life and use their power to defeat your enemies, in this Story-driven/Action/Metroidvania inspired game, set in a beautiful hand-drawn 2D world.

name: Ultimate Protector
description: Tired of moving around without purposes? Come and protect the goddess with multiple combination of skills and elements. Discover and upgrade your weapon to super, even hyper! Play this game with a joy from both tower defense and rogue!

name: Two Move Chess
description: Chess, but White moves TWICE!

name: Idle magic herb
description: This game is a hang up game that integrates elements such as cultivating immortals, farming, playing strange things, and collecting cards. Protect the liver and protect the liver.

name: Hollowbody
description:
A tech-noir survival horror short story, set in the urban decay of a long abandoned British city.

It's a Shipper's biggest fear. You're grounded in the exclusion zone, twenty miles of death and decay sealed off by the towering, suffocating walls erected after the collapse.

Play as Mica, an unlicensed black market shipper who will stop at nothing to find her missing partner.

Alone, stranded, and with limited resources at your disposal you'll have to push your way through the zone, solve environmental puzzles, manage resources and fight for your life as you try to find a way to escape beyond the wall.

name: Holiday Jigsaw: Thanksgiving Day 3
description: Gobble-gobble! 500 high-quality photos! 500 ideas for a happy family harvest holiday in Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 3!

name: Holiday Jigsaw: Christmas 2
description: Who says Christmas miracles don't exist? 500 new high-quality photos in the new Holiday Jigsaw!

name: HimeYoku: A Sacrifice of Lust and Grace
description: Hell-bent on vengeance, Caldo single-handedly topples the royal throne of Solide, capturing the king and the princess and working their ruin through his dark contracts with demons. A visual novel about hate and revenge... and possibly redemption.

name: Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion
description: "Hero's Adventure" is an open world RPG game: a pixel version of the Jianghu survival simulator. It restores the experience of a common person standing out from the bottom of the heap.

name: Hardrock Sex 3D
description: Hardrock Sex 3D is a visual novel game with 3D animated sex scenes. Meet our characters, discover their story and explore all the hot scenes they are to offer.

name: Gold Drill
description: Gold Drill is a classic arcade puzzle game where you connect pipes. Clear the stage and enjoy the rewards the girls give you!

name: HappyFunland
description: Explore the abandoned remains and uncover the dark secrets of Mort Grisly's HappyFunland theme park, Home of Randy Rodent! A darkly comedic VR horror experience where the fun never dies!

name: Pavor
description: Pavor is an online co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players. You are a professional electrical repair and ghost exterminator, repairing broken houses and exterminating ghosts as requested.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - The Treasure of the Midnight Isles
description: The islands scattered across the dark abyssal ocean hide treasures untold – and horrors unspeakable. Board the grim cursed ship and venture into the unknown to find your fortune... or demise.

name: Path to Warband
description: Path to Warband is a unique card battler inspired by many of its predecessors. Recruit, promote, and command cards to fight. Events and relics, the Wanted and bounty! And the most fun, fusing effects of cards! Infinite possibilities are waiting for you to be discovered.

name: Party Friends
description: Play minigames like Parkour, Prophunt, Fall Tower or other games with up to 16 players. And way more to come!

name: ParkTo
description: ParkTo is a simple puzzle game that stops the car at its destination. You don't drive a car yourself. The car just moves forward. Use the given triggers to move the car to its destination.

name: Perfect Tides: Station to Station
description: A point n' click sequel to Perfect Tides about the momentum and whiplash of young adulthood.

name: Periphery Synthetic
description: Explore a planetary system, synthesize new abilities, and reveal its past. This interactive EP offers a chill and non-violent metroidvania experience across procedurally-generated musical playgrounds.

name: Pete's Peril
description: Solving puzzles of all skill levels, dodging boulders, grabbing diamonds, upgrading tools, clothing for different climates and crush enemies along the way is all part of Pete's Peril.

name: Petite Adventure
description: Time to rev up your tiny engines for some huge fun! Control a miniature vehicle and drive your way around household obstacles

name: Poly Parkour
description: Test your skills in this challenging Jump'n Run game.

name: Plan B: Goddess's cards
description: As soon as Plan B starts, you secretly arrest a number of suspects, all sexy beauties without exception. You have given up torture this time, and perhaps a tongue-in-cheek battle is more suitable for this interrogation. . .

name: Tales of Guards Elves
description: This is an RPG with novel combat gameplay. combat random. Players can capture their favorite Weilings, roll dice for movement, place and upgrade Weilings for layout, and fight under novel rules that allow the protagonist to unleash skills.

name: Mega Drive Mini 2
description: The second version of the Mega Drive Mini, released in Japan on 27 October 2022. This new iteration will include 50 games, some of them being Mega CD titles. This is the Japanese version of the mini console.

name: Swords & Adventures
description: Enter a fantastic world in search of fame and glory!

name: Survival Epoch
description: In the post-Soviet space, among the abandoned alleys of the city, broken houses, everyone is trying to survive, in search of food, weapons and ammunition, you will stumble upon enemies or friends who will later become your companions and support in these harsh conditions.

name: Super Kill-Boi 9000
description: Defend yourself from a horde of huge eye monsters by building your very own fighting robot - Kill-BOI 9000, your new best friend and toaster. Choose from a large variety of weapons and combine them to make them even larger and ridiculously powerful! Like shooting burning cannon balls.

name: Super Domino Effect 3D
description: Super Domino Effect 3D! is the last challenging Domino Effect Simulator. Your only goal is to create incredible, compelling and endless chain effects, using domino bricks, slides, platforms, "animated" games and everything your imagination suggests.

name: Super Ball Arena
description: Multiplayer ‘couch game’ that can be played up to 4 players. The primary purpose is to defeat others by hitting a ball so that it collides with the target, inflicting damage in the process.

name: Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers
description: Collect and battle over 180 unique creatures in this roguelike auto-battler. Level-up and evolve your Kādomon as you assemble the ultimate team, creating awesome synergies to beat BIG bosses!

name: Stunts Contest: Super Bike
description: Going on the most dangerous curves, you will really show who is a master in driving a powerful motorcycle. Let's prove that you deserve the nickname N01. As a motorcycle driver, your mission is to pass all these difficult levels successfully!

name: Stunts Contest: Beach Edition
description: The time has come when we can combine useful with pleasant. Stunts Contest: Beach Edition is a racing game where as motorcycle driver you will need to pass every mission on these beautiful beaches. You can't hide something like that from people's eyes.

name: Step Journey
description: Unusual turn-based RPG, combining Hack and SlashWith each level, monsters become more difficult and unusual, new weapons and armor appear.Locations are created using procedural generation, each map will be unique, but no less beautiful and interesting.

name: Stardust Valkyries
description: 1v1 anime fighter X platform fighter hybrid with rollback netcode!

name: Staffer Case
description:
Staffer Case is a new sort of mystery game, asking players to find clues, arrange them into documents, and point out the contradictions between them to solve a series of murders.

The game is set in a fictional version of London in the 1960s where 10% of all residents have some sort of supernatural ability. In this city, incidents involving staffers, the people who have these abilities, are constantly occurring.

Players take the role of the Mana Affairs Division's newest detective, Notrick, in order to make sense of these incidents. Since the tricks buried within these staffer cases, at their core, revolve around the supernatural abilities of these criminals, conventional investigative methods won't be enough to solve them. Instead, players will have to rely on the documents that explain what their suspects' abilities entail in order to make sense of everything.

name: Spellmasons
description: Spellmasons is a tactical, turn-based, roguelike where you and your friends play as mages who combine spell pieces into powerful, epic spells!

name: Spell Defender
description: Spell Defender is a 3D, Third-Person, wave defence, survival game, with simple gameplay. Use magical powers to defeat waves of enemies. Each wave rewards you with a choice of a new power. Find synergies and combine these powers to create the ultimate defender.

name: Speedrunner's Paradise: Sky is the limit
description: This game is a simple 3D platformer. It is very easy to understand the mechanics of the game, and anyone can play. But, can anyone finish this game? Anyway, as i was saying. This game is an experience. Will you enjoy it? I don't know. Maybe, you should.....Try it yourself!?!?!?!

name: Space Gold Rush TD
description: Join in on the next gold rush and become a prospector in space. In this unique tower defense you can set up and reposition towers for maximum efficiency and adapt to the environment.

name: Soulsland: Last Fight
description: New evil army and 4 bosses has rised and captured souls again to gravestone. You Powerful Lord Barbarus are again world only hope. So beat enemies and find captured souls at different areas

name: Sowa VR
description: SOWA VR - is a multiplayer virtual reality shooter with a focus on community features. Realistic and simplified recharge features and fast paced combat as part of the core experience. Challenge yourself on the battlefield in our Sowa vr game.

name: The Sims 4: First Fits Kit
description: Dress the next generation of trendsetters in fashion fit for a playdate with The Sims 4 First Fits Kit. Whether a child Sim wants to turn heads on the first day of school or run around having fun with friends, these versatile styles will keep them looking fashionable (and SO cute).

name: The Songbird Guild
description: The Songbird Guild is a Yuri RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about magical girls falling in love. Investigate the secrets of a corrupt fantasy world and fight creepy (yet somehow adorable?) monsters in turn-based battles, all to pay the bills in this world where being a magical girl is a regular 9-5 job.

name: The Suits Have Gone Mad!
description: The Suits Have Gone Mad! is a brand-new episodic series where you unravel the mysteries behind the monopoly of Blake & Whitley Innovations and bring color into the world.

name: TheTravelGame
description: A few minutes per play. Your questions will change the world.... A quiz horror game with multiple endings.

name: The Twilight of Infinity: Episode 4 - Therefore I Am
description: "If only I'd paid attention in French class" was something Alex could only say in English, which is not helpful when in 16th century France trying to help victims of the Black Death..

name: Total Tank Generals
description: Every war has its Generals. Take command of an army during World War II and lead them to victory. Strategize your way through many scenarios and real historical military campaigns of past generals.

name: TimeLost
description: TimeLost is a soulslike action fighter that puts players in the driver's seat of their abilities, demanding quick thinking and precise execution. With seamless weapon swapping at the core of combat, every decision counts as you dodge, block, and disrupt enemy maneuvers on your way to victory.

name: This Girl Does Not Exist
description: This Girl Does Not Exist is the first game of its kind. It is a game full of beautiful girls .. all of whom have been generated by a creative AI! Dive into this vibrant colorful puzzle game and discover unique personality of each girl as you unlock their beautiful pictures.

name: The Wild: Survival Game
description: Your plane broke down. Survive and find out how to escape from the island

name: The Wave of Monké
description: The Wave of Monké is an action-comedy RPG set in the internetwork of the multiverse. Explore the journey of a gorilla wanting to be more... evolved.

name: The Wassie Games
description: Do you have what it takes to survive the wassie games? This is the ultimate test of a wassie's skill and determination! There can be only one winner, so only the bravest wassies should choose to compete in this multi-level Battle Royale.

name: The Unexplained
description: The Unexplained is a paranormal/psychological horror game where you and up to 6 people can go to various locations to discover and find the deep dark hidden secrets! But beware of the spirits left behind as we don't know if they are friendly.

name: The Underground Man 2
description: We at MEHSOFT are proud to present a sequel to our very first game The Underground Man. This game is a pleasure for the fans of classic video games. Experience a mix of different genres such as beat 'em up, point-and-click, platformer, and many more in a thrilling post-apocalyptic adventure.

name: The Pizza Courier
description: Our mission is to make people happy, eating the best pizza in town, as it is taken out of the oven. Do you think you are ready for such challenges?

name: The Peak Climb VR
description: Peak Climb VR will bring you an action-packed full-time professional climbing experience and give you exciting moments. While every part of this experience will entertain you, it will also provide you with a tiring calorie burn and game music will provide you with spiritual therapy.

name: The Original Island
description: The Original IslandIs an open world island survival RPG independently developed by Lanmeng technology. From the main perspective of the victim, Lin Yunfeng, it depicts a beautiful and dangerous, magnificent and mysterious island, and tries to solve its secrets.

name: The Longest Walk
description: The Longest Walk is a deeply personal biographical documentary walking simulator game about my father's experience of living with depression and suicidal thoughts.

name: The Lightkeeper
description: The magnetism of a cursed island in the middle of the ocean. Loneliness and fear in its pure state. The Lightkeeper is a first-person game where you will delve into the most unfathomable mysteries of the human being without neglecting your main mission: to keep the lighthouse lit.

name: The Legend of Capa Negra
description: The Legend of Capa Negra is a souls-like Action-RPG set in a medieval, dark fantasy world. As a new member of the Rebel Faction, your first mission will be to travel to a small village to meet a contact, find your way through dangerous landscapes, and join the war against the King!

name: The King's Castle
description: The castle is in danger.! Enemies from neighboring kingdoms are approaching. Take everything under control, because there is no one left. Everyone relies only on you.

name: The Impossible Knight Runner
description: The Impossible Knight Runner is an intense hack-and-slash platformer full of creatures trying to put an end to your adventure. Enter the dungeon with courage and decisiveness as the slightest misstake will be your downfall.

name: The Hunted
description: Horror based and survial strategy game

name: Sega Genesis Mini 2
description: The international version of the Sega Genesis Mini is an Amazon exclusive product. It contains games from the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive, as well from the Sega CD. It has a newly developed game called Devi & Pii and new exclusive ports of arcade games.

name: The Hard Game
description: Can you beat these five HARD levels? Who knows, you may just get some "lovely rewards" for your efforts!

name: The Grizzled: Armistice Digital
description: In The Grizzled: Armistice Digital, players take on the role of soldiers facing the Trials and Hard Knocks of the first World War. They work cooperatively across a campaign where they confront the major events of the war. From the introduction scenario of Boot Camp, through the nine different Missions, everything that happens carries forward and affects the next steps of the game. Players will need to make good decisions and support each other if they hope to make it to the end of the war alive.

name: The First Step
description: Explore 2 levels, and collect all the required items. The levels are timed, so you can try to beat the levels as fast as possible. Or you can casually take your time and explore around. This project is only meant as a learning project for me. So please do not expect a complete game.

name: Fantasy Zone
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis Mini 2/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Spatter
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Super Locomotive
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Vs. Puyo Puyo Sun
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Space Harrier II
description: A port of the Arcade game, made exclusively for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Devi & Pii
description: A new Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game released on the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: College Kings: Act II
description: Sex, girls, parties, and power. As a freshman at San Vallejo College, you have the whole world in front of you - but it’s up to you to take it. Will you let the next four years pass you by, or will you lead your fraternity to the crown and become campus royalty?

name: Nope Nope Nurses
description:
Hospital ≠ hospitality...?!
Yamada is afflicted with a rare condition that makes his life hard, and when he manages to break bones in both his hands too, he ends up on a medical bed with beautiful nurses tending to his every need.
Make no mistake, though—these nurses are vicious and no love sparks fly… Will young Yamada leave the hospital with his sanity intact?

name: College Kings: Act III
description: Sex, girls, parties, and power. As a freshman at San Vallejo College, you have the whole world in front of you - but it’s up to you to take it. Will you let the next four years pass you by, or will you lead your fraternity to the crown and become campus royalty?

name: College Kings: Act IV
description: College Kings - Act IV was later cancelled and is now a standalone game by the name of College Kings 2.

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Go
description: The 7th season of Pokémon Go, "Season of Go", is themed as a celebration of Pokémon Go itself. Some events included the in-person event Pokémon Go Fest 2022, the new character Rhi and the focus on Ultra Beasts and Ultra Wormholes.

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Light
description: The 8th season of Pokémon Go, "Season of Light", is themed by light and the cosmos. It will introduce the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo and Lunala (and their evolution family, Cosmog and Cosmoem) and feature special Pokémon Go Leagues.

name: Kindergarten
description: Caring for children is a cinch, right? Meet Mila, the super sweet owner of the Kindergarten daycare. Help her begin with one adorable baby then grow her business to an ultra baby boom. Keep the little ones happy by fulfilling their needs in the form of hunger, sleep, diaper changing, playtime, and vomit-free zones. The social rating shows your popularity with the parents in this bubbly time-management game. Are you the next daycare owner in high demand?

name: Jump 1/2
description:
This is the long-awaited sequel to JUMP. Started as a smaller collab inspired by the VIPs, it quickly spiralled out of control and became a true sequel. JUMP½ features even more of the wacky design and creativity JUMP is known for, on top of several new features and a significantly less brutal difficulty curve.

Jump's storehouses and dragon coin reward system return, along with the level info menu, hint movies, and a retry system for the hardest levels. This hack also boasts a brand new ASM-heavy boss or two, new unlockable items, plenty of hidden puzzles and 3-UP moons, saving at any time on the overworld, and a few other neat features.

name: Celeste Classic
description: An almost direct conversion of the prototype game Celeste Classic to the Game Boy Advance.

name: Jeff's No. 1 Bass Fishing
description: Jeff’s No.1 Bass Fishing was a response to the Shigesato Itoi #1 Bass Fishing Localization project, an April Fools event back in 2012. Started and completed in a mere 10 hours, Jeff’s No.1 Bass Fishing was a runaway international success and its influences on society and world culture can even be seen in your own household today.

name: Castlevania: Circle of the Moon GBC
description: Made in Game Boy studio 3.0.3, play a small segment of the catacombs and enjoy skeletons, bats and bone pillars getting in your way as you attempt to level up and farm candles for random drops of hearts, healing potions and the knife sub weapon.

name: Iron Emblem
description:
Iron Emblem is a hack that is designed with the only playstyle being true ironman (never resetting to restart a chapter, and the run being completely over when you have a game over).

Every single unit is a generic, complete with covered eyes and identical mugs, and even no real names! They are all just as strong as the enemies, and nothing more, so using them may be a bit more difficult than the usual FE unit fare. The gameplay and setup of the hack were very inspired by my experiences with fe1/11.

The challenge, then, is making your way through all 21 chapters successfully while getting invested in this group of nobodies trying to make their way through a cruel and harsh world of bloodshed and war. I hope you enjoy!

name: Advanced Pasta Cooking Simulator
description: The goal of this game is simple: just cook pasta. But be very careful: your neighbors are terrorists and they want to make sure you don’t get to taste any of it. Can you cook yourself lunch while they shoot at you through the windows?

name: Yoshi Deja Vu DS
description: Yoshi Deja Vu DS is a medium-sized ROM hack of Super Mario 64 DS. This hack features 5 Main Courses and 5 Side Courses.

name: Interesting Kaizo World
description:
An intermediate Kaizo Rom Hack of Super Mario World.

The Hack Features :
- Kind of Vanilla Levels Design
- Fast Retry System
- No Overworld
- No Wall Jump
- No Rope Glitch
- No Double Switch Hit
- Custom Sprites
- Custom Musics

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
description:
Phantom Liberty is a spy-thriller expansion for the open-world action-adventure RPG Cyberpunk 2077. When the orbital shuttle of the President of the New United States of America is shot down over the deadliest district of Night City, there’s only one person who can save her — you. Become V, a cyberpunk for hire, and dive deep into a tangled web of espionage and political intrigue, unraveling a story that connects the highest echelons of power with the brutal world of black-market mercenaries.

Infiltrate Dogtown, a city-within-a-city run by a trigger-happy militia and ruled by a leader with an iron fist. With the help of NUSA sleeper agent Solomon Reed (Idris Elba) and the support of Johnny Silverhand (Keanu Reeves), unravel a web of shattered loyalties and use your every skill to survive in a fractured world of desperate hustlers, shadowy netrunners, and ruthless mercenaries. Built with the power of next-gen hardware in mind, Phantom Liberty offers brand-new gameplay mechanics, nail-biting courier jobs, gigs, and missions — and a thrilling main quest where freedom and loyalty always come at a price.

name: Water Star Adventure
description:
Water Star Adventure is a ROM hack for Super Mario 64. It is the seventh installment of the "Star Adventure" hack series, featuring 7 courses with 30 stars including a Bowser fight.

The gimmick, as the game title implies, it has a new mechanism using water physics that the player can use to swim to navigate unreachable places. The plot is bound with philosophy and religious metaphors and most stars and NPCs will tell the player have more or less relevance in the gameplay.

name: I Hate You
description: "I HATE YOU" is a ROM hack remake of a creepypaste by the same name.

name: Love in Lockdown: Eli Version
description:
This is the counterpart to Love in Lockdown: Ella Version.

It's the year 2025 in the United Kingdom. 5 years have passed since the initial coronavirus lockdown, and with the gradual spread of dangerous new variants, life is still far from what it was. Fighting a losing battle with no certain end in sight, the government has invested billions of pounds into new technology to help aid Britain's single adult households, struggling to deal with the state of perpetual isolation.

You have been selected to participate in a new wave of trials testing the effectiveness of the latest synthetic model. Meet ELI, your emergency lockdown loneliness assistant.

name: Lucid
description: Discover your own legend in Lucid. Platform through a crystalline world torn apart by calamity, absorb powerful abilities that expand movement and enhance combat against a diverse cast of enemies and bosses, all in gorgeous pixel art inspired by the golden age of 2D sidescrollers.

name: Some Sword, Some Play
description: You are a professional duelist, bound to the service of your noble patron, the eccentric Marquessa. But that doesn't mean you can't have a little fun.

name: Aftermath
description: The story of a soldier left alone in a bunker.

name: Firewall Ultra
description: Enlist as an elite contractor and squad up for PVP and PVE multiplayer missions in Firewall Ultra, a tactical first-person shooter in development by First Contact Entertainment for PS VR2.

name: Queen Mary's Script Retold
description:
Queen Mary's Script tells the peculiar story of a girl thrust into the world of dolls and contracts. Join Mary, Clause and Edmund as the three travel between worlds, facing their past demons and learning more about themselves that they never intended to. They question just what it is they want as well as if it's worth the sacrifice to get it.

Queen Mary's Script - Retold is a complete overhaul of the main game. Updated graphics are not the only thing you'll see. Story changes, new havens/characters and different outcomes for certain characters will give you a whole different experience from the original!

name: Slap-It Together
description: Slap-It Together is a silly co-op game full of slapstick shenanigans and zany zombies. Put on a hat, pick-up a bat, and slap for survival in the greatest gameshow around!

name: Alight: Lunar Survival
description: Stranded in the darkness, survive and build a base scattered across the lunar surface to generate electricity and alight the moon as you upgrade your equipment, struggle for oxygen, and escape fearsome monsters. Alone or together you will survive, gather, craft, build, and explore.

name: Straight!?
description: Straight!? is a coming-of-age visual novel about Zack, a 19-year-old college student, and his journey of self-discovery after meeting his new roommate, Braden. Players follow Zack as he explores his feelings, navigates his identity, and develops relationships. The game focuses on dialogue and character development, addressing themes like sexuality, attraction, and personal growth through choices that shape the story.

name: Gayandere
description: You go to a mountain chalet after a recent breakup. There, strange things are going to happen...

name: Questions Pour un Champion: Edition Spéciale 20 Ans
description:
A quizz game adapted from a French TV show.
You can test your general knowledge by playing one the three game modes.
The Super Champion mode recreates the TV show specials where you need to reach 5 victories in a row.
The Partie Classique mode allow you to play on game.
The Entrainement mode allows you to train yourself.

name: Deadshot
description:
Deadshot.io is a CS:GO style IO game that you can play right now within your browser at https://deadshot.io

As a highly skilled FPS Shooter, you have 4 different maps to master, along with 4 different weapon classes you can use. Taking inspiration from other games, Deadshot allows a quick and efficient movement system that allows you to slide around the map and confuse your enemies. This game is constantly in development, so expect many more exciting features coming soon!

name: Honeypot
description: A queer erotic scifi-fantasy game about being stranded on a perverse part of an alien planet with an alien companion.

name: The Stick and the Basket
description: A short and contemplative promenade inspired by Ursula K. Le Guin's Carrier Bag Theory of Fiction

name: Lucie's Bistro
description: How many frogs dose it take to change a light bulb?

name: Null Event
description:
Null Event is an 18+ smutgame set in a cyberpunk world with a mystery to solve, and a load of kinks to explore.

The Cygnet Building is finding it's dronified personnel going mysteriously missing, and they need someone to look into it. That's where Synesthesia comes in.

name: Entre Laços e Amassos
description: A young woman who wants to find direction in her life moves to a big city. There she goes to a festival and has misunderstandings and disasters, losing her job, home and getting stuck on a farm with a rude Agroboy.

name: Santa's Secret Valley
description: Santa’s Secret Valley is a light-hearted graphical adventure with a Christmas theme. Can you rescue Santa’s magic items? Each puzzle you solve takes you further into the unfolding story, and one step closer to winning. Highlights include the Christmas Quiz, the TransDimensional InterLocator, and a train ride aboard the Secret Valley Express.

name: A Caçadora: Sorriso de Vampiro
description: Sin descripción

name: The Wall Mustn't Fall
description: You will select a hero with unique abilities. As you defend your castle, you will earn money and loot. This will allow you to upgrade your castle and recruit ai controlled allies to synergize with and equip them with weapons and relics. You may also choose to allow the ai to control your hero.

name: Kuzgakai's Dungeon
description: One day you receive a message from your friend, but it was so strange... that night something happened. the Nightmare becomes real... or It was just another dream?... What would you do if your worst nightmare becomes an arcade?... Are you ready to face it? Are you ready to pay for your murder?

name: Exotica: Petshop Simulator
description: Exotica is a simulation game where you run an exotic pet shop in the city.

name: Seafrog
description: Seafrog is an action platformer where you use a giant wrench to perform tricks and combos in order to fly up walls and stick to ceilings! Explore hundreds of hand crafted levels as you grind enemies, complete platforming challenges, and defy gravity to escape a mysterious sinkhole in the ocean.

name: SeaOrama: World of Shipping
description: Seaorama: World of Shipping gives you all the tools necessary to become the next kingpin in the shipping industry. Buy ships, acquire contracts, travel the world, and do the job better than anyone else.

name: Seclusa
description: You're a wildlife photographer staying at a cozy, secluded safari lodge in East Africa. Spend time relaxing at scenic outlooks, snapping photos of local wildlife, and working your way through a variety of upgrades and unlockables in this laid-back photography sandbox.

name: Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold
description: Seven Dwarfs: Legends Untold is a co-op action roguelike where, in teams of up to four, players dive into the world of the Seven Dwarfs and aim to save Snow White from her unenviable fate by fending off enemies and defeating the forces of evil.

name: Shaytan
description: Shaytan is psychological horror game.Shaytan is devil in islam. Devil will try to mislead you so that you are on wrong way before Angel of death comes.

name: Shift of War
description: Get ready to perform all kinds of jobs such as eliminating the most wanted terrorists or recovering vital merchandise. All of this is represented in this top-down shooter game where you can play alone or with up to 4 friends in local multiplayer mode.

name: Shopping Spree: Extreme!!!
description: Make your way around the shopping center to collect items on your shopping list. But be careful; one slip up and you'll be paying for a broken item! Avoid grumpy shoppers or simply shove them out of the way! Various other obstacles get in your way as you fill your cart and make it to checkout!

name: Silentium
description: Delve into the labyrinth and decide your fate! A 2D turn-based RPG with dungeon building aspects. Farm, grow weapons, create new class combinations, and make hard decisions that will have consequences.

name: Simple Builder
description: Simple Builder is basically exactly what it's name is a simple building game. You can build a large number of structures and/or large ones and have five save locations to try out. As you build more in each save location your gathering range increases.

name: Skate Rift
description: An immersive first person skateboarding simulator set on an island, interconnected by many courses and rifts.

name: Terrorform
description: Terrorform is a modern take on classic FPS games. Blast your way through a space station and leave a wake of destruction in your wake.

name: The Birthday
description: This is a non-typical RPG game. Most of the elements of an RPG are not including in this game except controlling the protagonist, some triggered events, and items. The game purpose is searching and collecting enough candles in finite time. Sometimes you have to think in this game.

name: The Burrito Quest
description: Someone stole your burrito. You have to find it. What are you waiting for?

name: The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault
description: The wastes of Dubai have been overwhelmed by Screamers. Play and evolve the iconic characters from the hit novel; The Chronicles: Wasteland and take back the dead lands. Survive against the horror and use whatever it takes to last long enough to build sanctions, unlock characters and items.

name: The City Cards Challenge
description: Relax with this challenge by building your city and placing the cards buildings with different effects in an optimal way for the residents.

name: The Entity Code
description: The Entity Code is a sci-fi themed 2D puzzle game with simple but challenging mechanics.

name: The Fairy's Secret
description: In the sequel to the fantasy yuri visual novel, The Fairy's Song, Marnie and Lisbeth return to Fenchapel to visit Marnie’s grandmother. Things soon become complicated, however, when they run into two figures from the past who ought to be dead.

name: The Lost Delinquents of Rollings High
description: "The Lost Delinquents of Rollings High" A visual novel, choose your own adventure game, with an 80s anime inspired look and feel.

name: ToyBox Security
description: ToyBox Security is a team based 4 player online action comedy game where kids left home alone must use traps to fend off dimwitted burglars.

name: Toy Sports
description: With Toy Sports, you will return to an exciting and very special place: your childhood memories. Now it is YOUR time to be the toy you love, drive cars, compete in various sports for points, prizes and glory. Prepare your engines and play with the whole family!

name: Train Simulator: Holzkirchen - Wörgl Route
description: All aboard for Austria! Take charge of cross-border passenger & freight traffic with RSSLO’s Holzkirchen - Wörgl route for Train Simulator.

name: R.I.P. Tour
description: A death game visual novel where murder victims are decided by group consensus. Make friends and enemies, solve the mysteries of an abandoned amusement park, and suss out the traitor in your group.

name: Robot Resistors
description: Robot Resistors is a rogue-lite action game with auto-attacking weapons and deep customization. Choose from multiple stages, characters, weapons, and upgrades to make each twenty-minute run unique. Escape your brutal robot overlords or be turned to scrap!

name: RollCats
description: A futuristic racing game across the galaxy. Huge cats rolling on massive wheels. Drifts, weapons and crazy speed tests your driving skills!

name: Rome Defenders: The First Wave
description: Support the brave Romans and face the terrible creatures from the deepest gates of the underworld!

name: RunBean Galactic
description: Run, jump and roll on your way to the new high score! Sounds easy, right? Not when you try to keep up with the hazards and bonuses that are constantly appearing all around the planet!

name: Runeseeker
description: Runeseeker is an adventure RPG in the tradition of text adventures and story-heavy RPGs, with a small influence of retro Japanese RPGs. In a world controlled by power hungry god-emperors, do you strive to be the leader to knock them down?

name: And Then You Come to a House Not Unlike the Previous One
description:
You haven't been over since she told you a month ago that she was moving to some small town in Wisconsin. But Riley is here, and the computer is here, and that's what matters for now. "Have you played the game yet?"

"You told me to wait to play it with you about a billion times," she says.

A work of interactive fiction by B.J. Best.

name: Infinite Adventure
description:
The Abort/Retry/Fail team is proud to present the famously lost INFINITE ADVENTURE. This game is a visionary pioneer in procedural text generation, randomly generating rooms, maps, items, descriptions, and puzzles for a text adventure set in a Victorian mansion. INFINITE ADVENTURE was available for sale for only one month through a Spring 1987 shareware catalog published in Cleveland, Ohio.

An "interactive feelie" accompaniment to B.J. Best's game And Then You Come to a House Not Unlike the Previous One.

name: Rêverie
description: It's your birthday! The first thing you do after opening your gift is try it out on the ice. As you find your bearings with your mentor you start to discover yourself...

name: The Prey MMORPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Illusion Tales
description: Sin descripción

name: Symphony of Epic
description: Sin descripción

name: Yeolhyeol Kangho W
description: Sin descripción

name: Luna with the Moonlight
description: Sin descripción

name: Special Force for Kakao
description: Sin descripción

name: Samgukji 2022
description: Sin descripción

name: Kangnim2: Jecheondaeseong
description: Sin descripción

name: Warlander
description:
Warlander is an action-packed, third-person, online-multiplayer game, with a unique style that mashes a Medieval-inspired setting, Fantastical items and abilities…and…even powerful robots!

Featuring intense competitive skirmishes and epic castle siege warfare with up to 100 players, you must use the almighty powers of god-like Warriors, Clerics, and Mages, as well as siege weapons and cataclysmic spells to control the battlefield.

To be victorious, you must work as a team, defend your Keep, and tactically break into the enemy’s stronghold to destroy their core!

name: The Hon
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories of Mir
description: Sin descripción

name: Ribon: Sabukseong Gyeoljeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Priston Tale M
description: Sin descripción

name: Mereuhell Fantasy
description: Sin descripción

name: Cerebral
description: Cerebral is a non-linear psychological horror game set in an ever-changing residential tower. Distinguish reality from illusion and survive this endless mind-bending nightmare, but death is not the end.

name: Roach Race
description: Roach Race is a free-to-play arcade platform game from CD PROJEKT RED, developed in collaboration with Crunching Koalas. Embark on a never-ending journey across the Continent with Roach and discover iconic locations from The Witcher series of games - in a never-before-seen 2D version. Collect points and climb the ranks to the very top of the global leaderboard.

name: Keomtuseu Peuroyagu V22
description: Sin descripción

name: Sinemareul Butakae
description: Sin descripción

name: Yosin: Gumihodyeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Matrix Jump
description: "Matrix Jump" is a short game where you have to jump through 4 levels.

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Neustadt im Hex-Chaos
description: Young witch Schubia Wanzhaar turns Neustadt upside down! From Aunt Mania's witch book, she tried out a very special spell that was forbidden and caused a huge chaos in the whole city. Great fun for Schubia, a nightmare for the citizens of Neustadt. And everyone thinks Bibi Blocksberg is the culprit. Now it's up to you: slip into the role of Bibi and uncover the error! To do this, you must try to undo the whole mess.

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Das gestohlene Hexbuch
description: Sin descripción

name: Distant Bloom
description: From a world in ruins to a world in bloom. This serene management game lets you explore an alien planet where things have gone amiss. Harness the power of plants to restore the environment and build a flourishing community with your crewmates.

name: Shutokou Battle Online
description: Shutokou Battle Online was a MMO take on the infamous Shutokou Battle (aka, Tokyo Xtreme Racer) formula. Released on PC only in Japan, this game had a short life from 2003 to 2005.

name: Angra-I
description:
Angra-I is a text-based adventure developed by Renato Degiovani, about a crazy programmer who has put the nuclear reactor at the Angra dos Reis power plant in the process of self-destruction, and now you, the player, need to enter the power plant, find the reactor control terminals, and deactivate the program that is controlling everything.
Time is short, and the player cannot waste it by trial and error. You have to think and act in the right direction, or else... Booooom!

name: Pokémon: A Grand Day Out
description: In this game, you will be a young trainer. One morning, you were woken up by the noise of explosions. The atmosphere was so confused at that time. At lunchtime, you decided to find out what are the reasons. Giovanni and his Team Rocket are having more unusual behaviors than normal. Finally, you found out that they are trying to catch a Cubone by blowing up all of Route 1!

name: Cookie Clicker
description: This project aims to port Cookie Clicker, a web game by Orteil, to the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Gourmet Guy's 1000 IQ Food Quiz
description: Help Gourmet Guy win the 1000 IQ Food Quiz!

name: Ghostbusters Remastered
description:
This is a complete modification of the US version of Ghostbusters on the NES.

Features:
- Overhauled graphics (99% original. Character sprites and Slimer adapted from The New Ghostbusters 2 on the Famicom).
- Doubled performance on many sections of the game.
- Much improved gameplay/controls everywhere.
- Heavily rebalanced game design.
- Countless bugs fixed.

name: Junkoid
description: Afflicted with perpetual nightmares, Junko is determined to defeat the manifestation of her dreams - the serpent trickster Asmodeus.

name: Tagline
description: Tagline is a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers. Parkour and snatch the tags off the walls of this funky metropolis, and overcome an array of enemies and challenges!

name: 3:28am
description: A Bitsy game about sleep and wanting to not wake up.

name: Cryaxion
description:
The year is 2051. Multiple large corporations are engaged in mining operations in the Belt. The need for good pilots and new ships is high. Cryaxion Corporation develops experimental new ships designed for the Belt and train pilots for their ships. Having signed up for the pilot training program at Cryaxion, you are now stationed there until you reach the advanced pilot ranks. You are advised to achieve as well as you can; your future will depend on it.

You can optionally also use the Virtual Reality (VR) Mode to use the game with Google Cardboard or Google Daydream.

Engage in hours of sci-fi adventure experiences with 50 challenging missions, trading at space stations, running cargo and trekking the belt.

name: Life After Magic
description:
"Life After Magic" is a Y2K, queer WLW visual novel focused around retired magical girls!

What's a magical girl to do when the teenage years are over, and there's no more bad guys for you to fight? How about navigating lost connections? Or juggling a totally awful retail gig? Worst of all - your magical powers are fading...

name: Temporal Riff
description: In a surreal universe that is controlled by music, you must sneak, climb and crawl through an army of mysterious agents. Playable in third-person (non-VR) or first-person (VR), you are armed with a musical spray paint and hook gun to help you follow and alter the musical landscape.

name: Orb Fort
description: A unique super-tight platformer with varied, highly challenging platforming and enemies. Run, dash, jump, and shoot to make your way through the secret fort and recover the stolen power orb. Featuring (currently) more than 150 difficult screens. Fast deaths and lightning-fast respawns.

name: Run Willy!
description: Slide on your belly, jump, run, avoid enemies and fly with the help of cannons to complete all the levels and bring Willy home There is no checkpoints, unless you give away your "Cool rocks."which you will collect by passing through the most dangerous paths.

name: Duelyst II
description: Choose your faction, construct your deck and put your strategy to the test in the evolution of the ultimate collectible tactics game.

name: Exipelago
description:
Exipelago is a colony building sim in a fully destructible world. You manage your growing tribe by providing food & shelter while building giant structures above and below the surface with the materials you gather.

You begin with 1-5 Villagers on an empty (randomly generated) island of various sizes. You will learn how to keep your villagers fed, how to provide them with shelter and how they can handle the nights.

Every block and every item in the world of exipelago can be gathered, destroyed, created or crafted into something else and every type of material will result in an equally different item being crafted out of it.

Bring your tribe to gloriness by building a big village on an initially empty island.

name: Empis
description: Empis is a turn-based strategy game that focuses on short and sweet multiplayer matches. Choose from individual factions each with their own unique units and upgrades, unlock technology, and build sprawling cities with buildings and fortifications.

name: Drunk: Relapsed
description: Drunk: Relapsed is a challenging and comedic 3D adventure. You will need to stumble and hop through the treacherous streets and alleys to reach the safety of your house. On your journey you'll be able to collect drinks to unlock new outfits.

name: Dream Walk: Stolen Color
description: Retrieve the stolen mysterious color as you fight your way through hordes of nightmares and other bizarre denizens of the dream world.

name: Fury Life
description: Fury Life is a Conway's Game of Life simulator where cells are visualized as animated creatures called "Octos".

name: Dwarven Realms
description: Face massive hordes of mobs and unleash chaotic abilities that paint the screen with mayhem. Dive into the largest mob density of any 3D ARPG and slay them all. Wield epic powers, create your build, and shape a world of endless possibilities in the action-packed ARPG experience.

name: Garbanzo Quest
description: Garbanzo Quest! The crazy bullet-heck platformer where your main weapon is your own spit! Help Garbanzo (and Pinto if you have a buddy) save their Friends from the evil Billi' Bones and his wacky world full of hand-crafted challenges, secrets, and branching paths!

name: Duct Tape Simulator
description: Duct Tape Simulator - In this game you act as duct tape and you have to fix cracked and broken things. Search the room for damaged items and repair them to fill up the integrity bar.

name: Eigengrau
description: A twist at every turn! Explore a colorful shoot 'em up with varied and diverse gameplay beyond the familiar shooting and dodging. Every situation, every enemy, and every boss offers a different handcrafted experience.

name: Escape From Meat City
description: A fast-paced, roguelike first-person shooter with hand-drawn visuals. Escape from the slaughterhouse, shoot your way through hordes of Federal Agents, and collect enough change for the bus!

name: Epileptic Seizure Battle Ball Challenge
description: Collect riches, fight monsters, unlock secrets and balance the task for which you have been chosen, saving humanity from an evil Saurian alien species by participating in a single player, fast paced, top down, permadeath, looter shooting, retro style game of Battle Ball.

name: Poly Link: Battle Heroes
description: "Poly Link: Battle Heroes" combines cool low-poly puzzles and awesome battle heroes. Solve the puzzles and collect the awesome heroes and cute girls.

name: Geometry Arena 2
description: Geometry Arena 2 is a free-form arena-shooter Roguelite game, dedicated to creating an exciting battle experience. Freely combine difficulty options, components, modules and upgrades to create the best gaming experience for yourself!

name: Runic
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Park
description: Welcome to the puzzle park! You will meet with a lot of puzzles scattered across the park. Solve them and get stars that will help you move forward. Choose your own path on which you will go, because the game is completely non-linear and with an open world.

name: Tankron
description: Tankron is a top-down wave survival roguelike in which you fight an ever-increasing amount and variety of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades to stand a chance. Discover and choose between 21 different tank specializations to enhance your Build.

name: Dimwarper
description: Dimwarper is an Icy Tower type of platformer, where You play as a mysterious character, who gained an ability to swap between two dimensions. Your task is to climb seven towers, controlled by seven wizards with different powers. This journey will require from You great focus and speed. Good luck!

name: Duppy Detective Tashia
description: Help Tashia unravel the mystery of her stolen shadow in this choice-driven adventure based on Caribbean folklore!

name: Slime Runner
description: Explore the treacherous realm as a slime, all while being protected by an ethereal entity in this precision-based platformer. Explore numerous regions, surpass the most difficult challenges, and find your way towards FREEDOM.

name: Falinere Fantasy
description: Falinere Fantasy is a turn-based RPG Dungeon Crawler played via Twitch Chat. Your viewers can change between 7 different classes (Druid, Alchemist, Crystalsmith, Bard, Warrior, Rogue, and Wizard) and run through dungeons, leveling up and gaining skills as they traverse the land.

name: Recondo
description: From the creator of Mud and Blood. Recondo is a hardcore real-time tactics simulation that has you leading a Ranger team behind the enemy lines during the Vietnam war. Plan, missions, equip your team and patrol behind enemy lines in a procedurally generated open world.

name: Execute Daddy: Papa ga Nandemo Shinu Game
description: In this ADV game, you become the administrator of a netherworld where you have lost both your memories and your body, and you have to recover your lost memories and body. The criminals who come back to life after execution after execution are cute, and their executions are like a show.

name: My Sexual Hospitalization
description: Souma, the main character, is hospitalized and falls in love at first sight with his doctor, Dr. Isami! Even though he keeps getting dumped, he is undeterred and makes a fierce attack, involving "boobs"! Eventually, the doctor begins to enjoy the silly interactions with Souma.

name: Furry Boss
description: Office work is boring as hell, especially when your boss is not a hot woman who likes to tease you. Gladly, we can show you how it feels to have one!

name: My Furry Trainer
description: A new year - a new life! This year I'll definitely start working out, I will achieve my goals! Now I just have to find a good trainer...

name: Dust & Neon
description: Dust & Neon pits a single mech-enhanced cowboy against an army of robots in this fast-paced, Roguelite Action RPG twin-stick shooter, set in a futuristic Wild West.

name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons: Design My Forest 2
description: Are you addicted to design & decorating? You can play with it now to design your dream forest with the most adorable foxes!

name: Echo Wars: Road Rage
description: Drive with one hand while shooting with the other, making your way through the memory lane of the Echo Brothers, two old cyber soldiers whose wacky and hectic memories you'll relive thanks to the magic of VR, in an adventure that can also be played in cooperative mode.

name: Tumble Toys: Aviation
description: Tumble Toys: Aviation is a unique flying game where you play as a tiny plane in a big room.

name: Taxi Life: A City Driving Simulator
description: Climb into the driver's seat of your car and your business, transport passengers across Barcelona and grow your company! Can you help relieve the transportation challenges of a city that never sleeps?

name: Furry Striptease
description: Furry Striptease - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful ladies.

name: Skinny & Franko: Fists of Violence
description: Brutal next chapter of Amiga's legendary beat'em'up 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge' is here. It's time to clean the streets of shit. The iconic game finally gets a sequel it deserves.

name: Quantum Coherence
description: A philosophical adventure game where you shoot and BLINC your way to save the universe. A delightful mixture of space combat and first person exploration. It's up to you and your skill to save everyone from entropy.

name: Garden Business
description: Create your own farm, collect the grown crops and sell them, build your own house and improve it.

name: Dream of Light
description: This is a walking simulator developed by Unreal 4. The scene contains a certain amount of fragmented dialogue content. It tells the story of a young girl who left her hometown to venture into the outside world. .......

name: Demon Path: Tower of Armagor
description: The game focuses on the adventure of a demon who decides to leave the planet by finding a portal. Reach the bottom of the tower, overcoming 1,000 randomly generated levels. Build a base for defense and recovery. Maybe you will succeed...

name: Rectangle Guy
description: Introducing Rectangle Guy, a brand new game by The Bare Minimum Studios. Rectangle Guy (game) features Rectangle Guy (character) in this platforming adventure! With over 30 levels and 6 boss fights and a plethora of post-game content, there's plenty to do and see in this wacky game.

name: Warrior
description: Warrior is a 2.5D Platform Action Adventure game set in a dark fantasy world.

name: Don't Hide
description: Trapped in a maze with a beast, you must find five keys and their door to escape. The monster can only smell and hear you, but as long as it hasn't fully caught your scent, you can move freely.

name: Pandecrown
description: Killomnia collapsed in 2019 after the virus escaped from the Medical Hospital in Laucthi City, which held the corporation liable for compensation in the Laucthi City Incident in 2019. The verdict led to bankruptcy, causing them and their subsidiaries to close for the year Following.

name: Runic Survivor
description: Combine Runes to craft unique spells! Survive the endless hordes of monsters as you work to break the four Runic seals! Runic is a casual horde shooter with rogue-lite elements and a charming retro aesthetic.

name: Sakura Sunshine
description: Rei and her pet cat, Koneko, are brainstorming the perfect manga! Battle Rei's adorable inner-thoughts as she overcomes her writer's block, shoot'em-up style!

name: Tuning Champions
description: Tuning Champions is a PvP Multiplayer Racing Game where you have to earn money by racing to upgrade your vehicle and beat the others! Featuring full vehicle tuning, low poly style and a lot of fun! Earn money and upgrade your vehicle to beat the others!

name: Outatime
description: Those boards don't work on water! Outatime is a futuristic multiplayer hoverboard racing game. Lean-to-move system designed from the ground up for VR. Race against the clock and other hoverboarders in a futuristic setting. Will you claim victory, complete the race, or be out of time...

name: Mottia: The Gem Hunters
description: Classic Roguelike (turn based, tile based) RPG with a rich character building system.

name: Dungeons 4
description: The Absolute Evil and its trusted *cough* servant, the Dark Elf Thalya, return in Dungeons 4 after the events of its fabulous predecessor to bring about their triumph over the forces of good once more.

name: My Escort Company
description: Start your own Escort Company now! Join your mentor, recruit girls, build your company, get to know the girls better!

name: Dragon Must Die
description: In the age of dragons, the most sexy and beautiful girls in the world are guarded by dragons, and they determine the fate of mankind. For the most noble freedom, for the highest quality genes, is it killing and plundering or heroism and redemption?

name: V.O.S.S. Turbo
description: VOSS Turbo is a retro styled, on rail, twin stick shooter with controller and keyboard support. Gameplay difficulty will climb as you visit and conquer new worlds. 30 stages to explore, with secrets to uncover, and bosses to whoop. Explore everything the multiverse has to offer!

name: CapoeiRogue: Dandara Cordão de Ouro
description: CapoeiRogue is a rogue-like capoeira game that mixes Afro-descendant culture in Brazil and fantasy, through the game mechanics you will experience elements that were of great importance to our history.

name: Live Cycling Manager 2022
description: Live Cycling Manager 2022 is the ultimate cycling manager game. Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.

name: Divinus Vanitas
description: This multiplayer souls-inspired spell-casting game sees you collecting equipment and finding new spells to help on your journey of proving your worth to the gods, and redeeming yourself from the cardinal sin of mortality. Explore the floating island and unravel the secrets of the fragmented world.

name: Riding to Bounce City
description: Game inspired by old-school racing games, with explicit sexual content in third person. A mysterious call makes these girls go on a pleasure trip, riding their faithful friend between their legs.

name: Manifest
description: This is a first person shooter game with 12 levels, every 3 levels the location changes from castle to forest, from forest to north pole and from north to another castle, you play as a nameless hero who wants to kill all the monsters.

name: Energy Tail
description: Energy Tail is an oldschool arcade game where you fight enemies in relentless arena battles. It's free, so go and give it a try!

name: Europa Universalis IV: Lions of the North
description: Europa Universalis IV: Lions of the North adds new mission trees and historical options for a number of Baltic Sea nations. Many of these options include new “branching missions'' which allow greater variety as you explore different alternate histories through the decisions you make.

name: Input Chaos
description: A physics based multiplayer fighting game.

name: Run or Boom
description: This game is inspired by an old game. Eliminate other players and be the last one standing.

name: Double Trouble
description: Meet Olivia and Elodie, two sisters on an adventure in an infinite imaginary landscape. Can you help them work together in order to discover what secrets are in store? Explore a colorful, infinite dream world in which to collect, build, unlock and more!

name: Enclosure 3-D
description: You are Mike Goodman, joining a mission to investigate mysterious activity at an arctic base. Text-parser mystery adventure game inspired by classics of the genre, using pixel art in 3D.

name: Exterminate Zombies: Get Paid
description: Exterminate Zombies: Get Paid (EZGP) is a 4 player co-op top down zombie shooter. Players survive endless waves of enemies with the chance of extraction after a final boss every 30 waves.

name: Escape
description: Escape is an online co-op game for 1 - 4 players. You and your team have entered a haunted mansion and got stuck there. Explore the procedurally generated environment, kill monsters, find clues, equip different weapons, and escape at any cost.

name: SoulBound
description: SoulBound is a 2D platformer where one player control’s a ninja whilst the other player controls a ghost who can possess and control the enemies to try and defeat the ninja. Once the ninja is defeated the player’s roles are swapped and whoever travels the furthest as the ninja wins

name: Fallen Bride Mege
description: Mege is the childhood sweetheart of the protagonist. Lucky enough, he is able to marry Mege with everyone's blessing and lives a happy life. But the sudden news of layoffs broke his peaceful days.

name: From Madness with Love
description: This is a dating sim with guys you will never be on the same page with! For some reason, you just can't communicate with the guy you like... An unusual yet extraordinary experience with a cute pixel art style, fully voiced in Japanese.

name: Get it Hard
description: This next generation simulation of the most stressful situation in life gets you the training you need. Get stress resistant and get it hard as fast as you can!

name: Purge Force 2070
description: The Sputnik 986 space station is under attack by alien life forms. You and your team are part of the cleanup team that is supposed to rid the station of the alien. Secure and clear the station from the aliens.

name: Railway Fun: Adventure Park
description: Organize railroad networks in this exciting time management game! Direct trains and monorails to clear areas and venture into new park sections.

name: Scuff(ed)
